title: the Hemp Solution.avi
description:
Revised Update & Expansion of the Highly acclaimed Documentary, the Hemp Revolution!

a film by Sol Ramana-Clarke

  The HEMP SOLUTION explores the Cannabis Sativa / Hemp plant's fascinating history, it's thousands of uses, the economic & cultural forces behind its prohibition, and its modern potential to solve major environmental problems.
   Hemp, together with the biotechnologies presented in this film, could revolutionize the planet with a shift from the present unsustainable petro-chemical based economy to a sustainable plant based economy.
   This highly profitable crop provides paper, textiles, composite materials, fuel, nutritious protein, valuable oil, building products, cosmetics and a useful medicine...

if only it were legal...
